Release History

Release History

Version Date Description
1.0.0 2016-11-01 Release of CMIS Sanity Tests

Release 1.0.0 – 2016-11-01

Type Changes By
ability to use models of Alfresco objects in your automation test pbrodner
ability to create data sites pbrodner
ability to create data users, tenant users pbrodner
ability to create groups pbrodner
ability to create content as: files/folders in any location in repository via CMIS pbrodner
ability to create workflows pbrodner
helpers for generating random data (Randomizers) pbrodner
ability to create data based on XML file (site structure). See XMLTestDataProvider.java pbrodner
ability to test extention points pbrodner
ability of asserting if particular extension point is installed ``` dataContent.assertExtensionAmpExists('artifact-id-of-extention-point') ``` pbrodner
ability to check the server health of Alfresco installed based only on IP and admin user provided. pbrodner
ability to generate HtmlReports based on your TestNG test (just add HtmlReportListener listener) pbrodner
ability to report test results into test tracker (TestRail used at thi point) pbrodner
ability to document steps in your @Test using STEP helper (info are passed on test tracker too) pbrodner
ability to annotate failing tests as @Bug (passing the jira id of the bug) pbrodner
ability to call JMX on Alfresco server (if alfresco is running in docker or behind a firewall we are using https://jolokia.org agent) pbrodner
ability to define your alfresco test environment properties (server, credentials, etc.) pbrodner
ability to query DBs pbrodner
